name: Nutrition and School Meals
description: SFUSD provides free healthy meals to students currently enrolled in SFUSD schools and programs. Depending on the school, the menu can include the following: - Breakfast - Lunch - Snacks - Supper - Field trip meals All school meals are free for all public school students in CA this school year. No application necessary. Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-749-3604 - Email: SchoolLunch@sfusd.edu
